summary: A script that sets up and runs a fine‑tuning job for an instruction‑guided Stable Diffusion model (Instruct‑Pix2Pix) using Megatron‑based latent diffusion editing. It parses Hydra configurations, builds a Megatron trainer, initializes the diffusion edit model, executes the training loop, and manages experiment logging and checkpoints.
business_intent: Enable developers to adapt the Instruct‑Pix2Pix diffusion model to custom datasets, creating specialized text‑driven image‑editing capabilities for downstream applications.
